name: Metal & Bones
description:
Metal & Bones is a Time- based RPG set in a fantasy x sci-fi environment.

an exploration mission through space by a group of sentient robots has gone awry, they crash-landed on what first appeared to be a barren planet. They discovered a single massive tower built of stone brick and pulsating with Blue and red lights. There also appeared to be large glowing crystals emitting multicolored light and blocking their transmissions.

The group set out to explore the strange Tower of this forgotten world only to encounter living skeletons that assaulted them t every turn. To make matters worse strange words echoed down from the top of the tower and with each syllable, they felt their systems malfunction and their chassis degrade.

They now must rush through the tower with all haste if they wish to survive.

Controls:  
W = selection up
S = selection down
Space = Selection command
ESC = cancel selected
